casebody.data:
Joseph Natale, an Infant, by Oscar Natale, His Guardian ad Litem, v. Great Atlantic & Pacific Tea Co.

Motion for extension of time denied, but trial is stayed until June 10, 1959, on condition that the appeal is argued or submitted on May 26, 1959. Concur — Breitel, J. P., Rabin, M. M. Frank, Valente and McNally, JJ.
